properties.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
properties.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 15 at 6:34AM AKST until January 17 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blizzard conditions occurring.

* WHERE...St Lawrence Island.

* WHEN...Until midnight Thursday night.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 55 mph will cause
whiteout conditions in blowing snow. Significant drifting of
the snow is likely.
properties.instruction:
A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are
expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds
and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout
conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

NWSheadline: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST THURSDAY NIGHT
